properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Sisters) Glorious, Glorious. (Brothers) Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! (All) Your name is above all names.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Sisters) Glorious, Glorious. (Brothers) Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! (All) Glorious is Your matchless name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Great Redeemer, Lord and Master, Light of all eternal days, Hear the saints of every nation Sing Your just and endless praise!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Sisters) Glorious, Glorious. (Brothers) Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! (All) Your name is above all names.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Sisters) Glorious, Glorious. (Brothers) Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! (All) Glorious is Your matchless name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From the throne of heaven’s glory To the cross of sin and shame, You did come to die a ransom, Guilty sinners to reclaim.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Sisters) Glorious, Glorious. (Brothers) Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! (All) Your name is above all names.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(Sisters) Glorious, Glorious. (Brothers) Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! Glorious is Your name, Oh Lord! (All) Glorious is Your matchless name. 10. Come, oh come, immortal Savior; Come and bring to earth Your throne; Come and reign as King forever In the kingdom all Your own!{/lang-eng}
